1 #Colors Colors

This is a color palette for the CCI website. You shall have no other colors before these.

Use .c-$color class for text color.

Use .bgc-$color class for background color.

Replace $color with corresponding color name.

Example:

<div class="c-primary-alpha">...</div>
<div class="bg-secondary-beta">...</div>
Source: scss/components/_colors.scss, line 1
